name: Catacombs (itch) (Geoff Blair)
description:
A roguelike game for the 7DRL Challenge 2020.

Descend into endless catacombs as a risen skeleton trying to regain life.

Controls:

  • Use the ARROW KEYS to navigate menus.
  • Use the SPACE or ENTER key to select menu options
  • Use the ARROW KEYS to move your character around the world
  • Bump into things to attack or interact with them
